info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 06 at 3:38PM EDT until September 08 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Waves build to 3 to 4 ft tonight, then to 5 to 8 feet by Thursday afternoon through early Friday morning. Structural and longshore currents likely, rip currents possible. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte county. In Michigan, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien counties. North facing beaches and piers will have the highest risk! * WHEN...From 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
